Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge, remained in Windsor to look after her children as the immediate family headed to Balmoral to be at the Queen's bedside.

articles.title: Emotional Katie Price hits back at claims she fabricated story about being raped - Daily Mail
articles.description: During an appearance on Steph's packed Lunch, the former glamour model, 44, declared that she 'didn't make any of it up' but is constantly branded a 'liar'.
articles.content:
Emotional Katie Price hit back at trolls who accused her of fabricating the story about being raped at gunpoint in South Africa on Thursday.

articles.author: Alex Cranz
articles.title: Guns are also out in the first trailer for Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery - The Verge
articles.description: In the first trailer for Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery, we get our first glimpse of the enormous cast that includes Daniel Craig, Janelle Monáe, Kathryn Hahn, Kate Hudson, Leslie Odom Jr., and David Bautista.
articles.content: David Bautista said suns out, guns out
